Articles.Content: Hey there, I was just wondering what I would have to do to get something from Maya into KSP. Also, can someone link me to a beginner tutorial on making parts?

Its pretty simple, export the part as a .dae (COLLADA) file and the rest isn\'t really connected to the modelling program at all anymore. The rest is the config file and texturing, for which tutorials already exist.
This guide should prbably be stickied: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=1101.0
